医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
国会中越来越多的人呼吁社会保障解决回扣问题本周，KFF 健康新闻和考克斯媒体集团的一项调查在国会山进一步引起关注，更多国会议员正式要求社会保障管理局就其错误支付给受益人的数十亿美元做出答复，然后命令他们偿还。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/In-Congress-calls-mount-for-Social-Security-to-address-clawbacks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/In-Congress-calls-mount-for-Social-Security-to-address-clawbacks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d496429-5848-4c54-8759-0a6368363351 Thu, 30 Nov 2023 14:48:44 -0500 In Congress, calls mount for Social Security to address clawbacks
大麻和酒精同时使用会扰乱大脑发育并损害记忆力过去几年大麻合法化的增加可能会增加大麻与酒精的混合使用。令人担忧的是，很少有研究关注这两种药物联合使用时的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Cannabis-and-alcohol-co-use-disrupts-brain-development-and-impairs-memory.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Cannabis-and-alcohol-co-use-disrupts-brain-development-and-impairs-memory.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=747db18d-66ee-47f5-8a14-3f4c262b835a Thu, 30 Nov 2023 14:45:45 -0500 Cannabis and alcohol co-use disrupts brain development and impairs memory
科学家发现糖尿病女性所生婴儿心脏缺陷的细胞原因当患有糖尿病的女性怀孕时，她们不仅面临着怀孕和即将成为父母的典型挑战，而且还面临着一个可怕的统计数据：她们生出患有先天性心脏病的婴儿的可能性是普通女性的五倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Scientists-uncover-cellular-cause-of-heart-defects-in-babies-born-to-women-with-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Scientists-uncover-cellular-cause-of-heart-defects-in-babies-born-to-women-with-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27ee5a3e-8f95-42eb-ba49-9c71eac6de1f Thu, 30 Nov 2023 14:27:17 -0500 Scientists uncover cellular cause of heart defects in babies born to women with diabetes
研究强调社交媒体对青少年健康的有害影响英国医学杂志今天发表的最新证据综述发现，社交媒体的使用与年轻人的危险健康行为有关，包括酗酒、吸毒和吸烟、反社会行为、危险性行为和赌博。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Study-highlights-harmful-impact-of-social-media-on-adolescent-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Study-highlights-harmful-impact-of-social-media-on-adolescent-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f49703a4-7f8c-40b4-ba8f-6c03c42c3789 Thu, 30 Nov 2023 14:20:59 -0500 Study highlights harmful impact of social media on adolescent health
波士顿大学研究人员因量化营养干预对结核病发病率的长期影响而荣获美国国立卫生研究院奖Pranay Sinha 医学博士是波士顿大学 Chobanian & Avedisian 医学院的医学助理教授，荣获美国国立卫生研究院指导研究科学家发展奖 (K01)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/BU-researcher-wins-NIH-award-to-quantify-long-term-impact-of-nutritional-interventions-on-TB-incidence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/BU-researcher-wins-NIH-award-to-quantify-long-term-impact-of-nutritional-interventions-on-TB-incidence.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00ada1e9-15a0-4e60-bdb4-93aeb482f36e Thu, 30 Nov 2023 14:10:56 -0500 BU researcher wins NIH award to quantify long-term impact of nutritional interventions on TB incidence
需要解决放射治疗中的结构性种族主义，以确保公平的癌症护理每个人都应该得到优质的护理，无论肤色如何。然而，隐性偏见、微侵犯和缺乏文化理解仍然存在，导致医疗保健领域的压迫和不平等待遇。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Structural-racism-in-radiotherapy-needs-to-be-addressed-to-ensure-equitable-cancer-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Structural-racism-in-radiotherapy-needs-to-be-addressed-to-ensure-equitable-cancer-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4192609-ebdd-4ee5-978b-948a0568a3c1 Thu, 30 Nov 2023 13:59:18 -0500 Structural racism in radiotherapy needs to be addressed to ensure equitable cancer care
SLACOM 和 NCCN 主办拉丁美洲地区乳腺癌峰会今天，拉丁美洲和加勒比肿瘤内科学会和国家综合癌症网络主办了拉丁美洲地区乳腺癌峰会：倡导和实施患者指南一致的癌症护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/SLACOM-and-NCCN-host-the-Latin-American-Regional-Breast-Cancer-Summit.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/SLACOM-and-NCCN-host-the-Latin-American-Regional-Breast-Cancer-Summit.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01aace90-e2ed-48d9-ba3b-9b23218f079c Thu, 30 Nov 2023 13:35:39 -0500 SLACOM and NCCN host the Latin American Regional Breast Cancer Summit
NHS 兑现增加 5000 万次全科医生预约的承诺英国 NHS 今天发布的数据显示，截至 2023 年 10 月，与 2019 年 10 月相比，全科医疗预约增加了 5090 万个，履行了 2019 年政府的一项重要承诺。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/NHS-delivers-on-promise-of-50-million-more-GP-appointments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/NHS-delivers-on-promise-of-50-million-more-GP-appointments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db1a088f-0319-420d-aad3-dd1411893ffb Thu, 30 Nov 2023 13:21:12 -0500 NHS delivers on promise of 50 million more GP appointments
一条胳膊和一条腿：为了获得健康保险，这对夫妇拍了一部电影去年秋天，艾伦·豪恩 (Ellen Haun) 和德鲁·约翰斯顿 (Dru Johnston) 忙着整理 2023 年的健康保险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/An-Arm-and-a-Leg-To-get-health-insurance-this- Couple-made-a-movie.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/An-Arm-and-a-Leg-To-get-health-insurance-this- Couple-made-a-movie.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3775d60-aabc-42aa-b02b-fa3bebacef60 Thu, 30 Nov 2023 13:10:35 -0500 An Arm and a Leg: To get health insurance, this couple made a movie
联邦贸易委员会主席准备与私募股权摊牌联邦贸易委员会最近提起的一项民事诉讼指控美国最大的麻醉集团之一的垄断行为，导致价格大幅上涨，这对私募股权投资者来说是一个警告，可能会削弱他们大举收购医生集团的力度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/FTC-chief-gears-up-for-a-showdown-with-private-equity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/FTC-chief-gears-up-for-a-showdown-with-private-equity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5275788d-04e9-4758-9578-e168ac59ae8d Thu, 30 Nov 2023 13:06:57 -0500 FTC chief gears up for a showdown with private equity
